text: fasab aladhin qaluu hadhih almqalt min al'umam alkhaliat wabal sayiyaat ma kasabuu min alaemal, fewjlu balkhzy fi alhayat aldnya, waladhin zalamuu 'anfusahum min qawmik -ayha alrswl-, waqaluu hadhih almqalt, sayusibuhum aydana wabal sayiyaat ma ksbu, kama 'asab aladhin min qblhm, wama hum bfaytyn allah wala sabqyh
